thread.title: Look: Customs agents find pot in hollowed out mesquite firewood
thread.title_full: Look: Customs agents find pot in hollowed out mesquite firewood - UPI.com

author: Ben Hooper
title: Look: Customs agents find pot in hollowed out mesquite firewood
text:
Feb. 22 (UPI) -- Customs officers in Arizona said they found more than 100 pounds of marijuana concealed inside hollowed-out pieces of firewood.
U.S. Customs and Border Protection said officers at the Port of Sasabe stopped a Ford truck driven by a 41-year-old man and a narcotics detecting canine indicated something unusual about the shipment of mesquite firewood in the back of the vehicle.
Officers took the firewood off the truck and split pieces in half, revealing hidden packages of marijuana.
The officers found more than 100 pounds of marijuana, worth an estimated $53,000.
The man, a Tucson resident, was turned over to Immigration and Customs Enforcement's Homeland Security Investigations for prosecution.
